text: is a museum in Okayama Prefecture, Japan.Nussbaum, Louis-Frédéric. (2005). "Museums" in Japan Encyclopedia, pp. 671-673. The museum is in the city of Okayama. The collection includes important historical objects from the local area. ==References== ==Other websites== * http://www.pref.okayama.jp/kyoiku/kenhaku/English.htm Category:Museums in Japan Category:Organizations based in Okayama Prefecture
title: Okayama Prefectural Museum
